::Seekker::
Seekker flies face first into the empty seat from a result of the 
increased speed.
"The bottle said 'Fix It SUPER GLUE' so why shouldn't it fix 
it..super...hahahahahaha"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Axis/Lokk::
> 
> "Suit yourself, Seekker," replies Lokk, "though I'd say we'll be 
> having more fun than you." he laughs smugly. He moves his hand 
> to increase the speed, and slams it forward, just to mess up 
> Seekker. "Haha now look who's having fun," The ship accelerates 
> quickly towards the planet. Axis, who has been quiet up till now, 
> grunts out, "Lokk, slow this thing down..." Lokk nods without 
> turning, and tries to push the speed control back to a more 
> moderate speed, but it wont budge... "Uhh oh, dangnabit! Seekker, 
> I told you to fix the sticking speed control before we left!" He 
looks 
> more closely and notices some, some glue?!? "Arg!" he shakes his 
> head as the three bots careen towards the increasingly bigger 
> planet.
>
